verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
If the altar's where You meet us
take me there, take me there
if what You need is just an offering
it's right here, my life is here

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
And I'll be a living sacrifice for You
You're a fire, the refiner
I want to be consumed

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
I want to be tried by fire, purified
You take whatever You desire
Lord, here's my life

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
If your glory wants to come in
Let it fall, I want it all
Your fire is consuming
Fill this place, set it ablaze

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
Clean my hands, purify my heart
I want to burn for You
Only for You
Take my life as a sacrifice
I want to burn for You
Only for You
